Summary: night siting, three objects all red in color
divs: Sighting DetailsMy stepson and I went out on new years eve at midnight to watch local family fireworks. A few minutes laer we noticed a red glow coming from the NE. It seemed to grow larger. At first we thought it was a firework display that didn't explode. We watched it contunue to travel towards us, we then noticed two other obects of the same color following behind it. I grabed my Binoculars from my car trunk and tried to focus on the objects. I wasn't ablee to bring them into focus. They then gradualy turned to the SE and contunued on in that direction. We watched them till they were no longer visible. No airplanes, or other objects were in the air. They were a lot higher than the exploding fireworks.No sounds were heard other then the fireworks exploding. I have mixed feelings about this, I am certian it was a true sighting. My stepson (23 yrs. old) became upset and went inside
